an4.84:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.84:1.3: Kodhagaru hoti na saddhammagaru, makkhagaru hoti na saddhammagaru, labhagaru hoti na saddhammagaru, sakkaragaru hoti na saddhammagaru—
an4.84:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.84:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an4.84:2.3: Saddhammagaru hoti na kodhagaru, saddhammagaru hoti na makkhagaru, saddhammagaru hoti na labhagaru, saddhammagaru hoti na sakkaragaru—
an4.84:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
